CIS-AWS-Foundations.name: CIS Amazon Web Services Foundations Benchmark

1.1.title: Avoid the use of the "root" account (Scored)

1.10.title: Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse (Scored)

1.11.title: Ensure IAM password policy expires passwords within 90 days or less (Scored)

1.12.title: Ensure no root account access key exists (Scored)

1.13.title: Ensure MFA is enabled for the "root" account (Scored)

1.14.title: Ensure hardware MFA is enabled for the "root" account (Scored)

1.15.title: Ensure security questions are registered in the AWS account (Not Scored)

1.16.title: Ensure IAM policies are attached only to groups or roles (Scored)

1.18.title: Ensure IAM Master and IAM Manager roles are active (Scored)

1.2.title: Ensure multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for all IAM users that have a console password (Scored)

1.20.title: Ensure security contact information is registered (Scored)

1.21.title: Ensure IAM instance roles are used for AWS resource access from instances (Not Scored)

1.22.title: Ensure a support role has been created to manage incidents with AWS Support (Scored)

1.23.title: Do not setup access keys during initial user setup for all IAM users that have a console password (Not Scored)

1.24.title: Ensure IAM policies that allow full "*:*" administrative privileges are not created (Scored)

1.3.title: Ensure credentials unused for 90 days or greater are disabled (Scored)

1.4.title: Ensure access keys are rotated every 90 days or less (Scored)

1.5.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one uppercase letter (Scored)

1.6.title: Ensure IAM password policy require at least one lowercase letter (Scored)

1.7.title: Ensure IAM password policy require at least one symbol (Scored)

1.8.title: Ensure IAM password policy require at least one number (Scored)

1.9.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires minimum length of 14 or greater (Scored)

2.1.title: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions (Scored)

2.2.title: Ensure CloudTrail log file validation is enabled (Scored)

2.3.title: Ensure the S3 bucket CloudTrail logs to is not publicly accessible (Scored)

2.4.title: Ensure CloudTrail trails are integrated with CloudWatch Logs (Scored)

2.5.title: Ensure AWS Config is enabled in all regions (Scored)

2.6.title: Ensure S3 bucket access logging is enabled on the CloudTrail S3 bucket (Scored)

2.7.title: Ensure CloudTrail logs are encrypted at rest using KMS CMKs (Scored)

2.8.title: Ensure rotation for customer created CMKs is enabled (Scored)

3.1.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for unauthorized API calls (Scored)

3.10.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for security group changes (Scored)

3.11.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to Network Access Control Lists (NACL) (Scored)

3.12.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to network gateways (Scored)

3.13.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for route table

3.14.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for VPC changes (Scored)

3.15.title: Ensure appropriate subscribers to each SNS topic (Not Scored)

3.2.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for Management Console sign-in without MFA (Scored)

3.3.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for usage of "root" account  (Scored)

3.4.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for IAM policy changes (Scored)

3.5.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for CloudTrail configuration changes (Scored)

3.6.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for AWS Management Console authentication failures (Scored)

3.7.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for disabling or scheduled deletion of customer created CMKs (Scored)

3.8.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for S3 bucket policy changes (Scored)

3.9.title: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for AWS Config configuration changes (Scored)

4.1.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22 (Scored)

4.2.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389 (Scored)

4.3.title: Ensure VPC flow logging is enabled in all VPCs (Scored)

4.4.title: Ensure the default security group of every VPC restricts all traffic (Scored)

4.5.title: Ensure routing tables for VPC peering are "least access" (Not Scored)

1.10.title: Ensure multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for all IAM users that have a console password (Automated)

1.11.title: Do not setup access keys during initial user setup for all IAM users that have a console password (Manual)

1.12.title: Ensure credentials unused for 45 days or greater are disabled (Automated)

1.13.title: Ensure there is only one active access key available for any single IAM user (Automated)

1.14.title: Ensure access keys are rotated every 90 days or less (Automated)

1.15.title: Ensure IAM Users Receive Permissions Only Through Groups (Automated)

1.16.title: Ensure IAM policies that allow full "*:*" administrative privileges are not attached (Automated)

1.17.title: Ensure a support role has been created to manage incidents with AWS Support (Automated)

1.18.title: Ensure IAM instance roles are used for AWS resource access from instances (Manual)

1.19.title: Ensure that all the expired SSL/TLS certificates stored in AWS IAM are removed (Automated)

1.2.title: Ensure security contact information is registered (Manual)

1.20.title: Ensure that IAM Access analyzer is enabled for all regions (Automated)

1.21.title: Ensure IAM users are managed centrally via identity federation or AWS Organizations for multi-account environments (Manual)

1.3.title: Ensure security questions are registered in the AWS account (Manual)

1.4.title: Ensure no 'root' user account access key exists (Automated)

1.5.title: Ensure MFA is enabled for the 'root' user account (Automated)

1.6.title: Ensure hardware MFA is enabled for the 'root' user account (Automated)

1.7.title: Eliminate use of the 'root' user for administrative and daily tasks (Automated)

1.8.title: Ensure IAM password policy requires minimum length of 14 or greater (Automated)

1.9.title: Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse (Automated)

2.1.1.title: Ensure all S3 buckets employ encryption-at-rest (Manual)

2.1.2.title: Ensure S3 Bucket Policy is set to deny HTTP requests (Manual)

2.1.3.title: Ensure MFA Delete is enable on S3 buckets (Automated)

2.1.4.title: Ensure all data in Amazon S3 has been discovered, classified and secured when required. (Manual)

2.1.5.title: Ensure that S3 Buckets are configured with 'Block public access (bucket settings)' (Automated)

2.2.1.title: Ensure EBS volume encryption is enabled (Manual)

5.1.title: Ensure no Network ACLs allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to remote server administration ports (Automated)

5.2.title: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to remote server administration ports (Automated)

1.1.title: Ensure that 'Multi-Factor Auth Status' is 'Enabled' for all Privileged Users (Manual)

1.10.title: Ensure that 'Users can add gallery apps to My Apps' is set to 'No' (Manual)

1.11.title: Ensure that 'Users can register applications' is set to 'No' (Manual)

1.12.title: Ensure That 'Guest users access restrictions' is set to 'Guest user access is restricted to properties and memberships of their own directory objects'' (Manual)

1.13.title: Ensure that 'Guest invite restrictions' is set to "Only users assigned to specific admin roles can invite guest users" (Manual)

1.14.title: Ensure That 'Restrict access to Azure AD administration portal' is Set to "Yes" (Manual)

1.15.title: Ensure that 'Restrict user ability to access groups features in the Access Pane' is Set to 'Yes' (Manual)

1.16.title: Ensure that 'Users can create security groups in Azure portals, API or PowerShell' is set to 'No' (Manual)

1.17.title: Ensure that 'Owners can manage group membership requests in the Access Panel' is set to 'No' (Manual)

1.18.title: Ensure that 'Users can create Microsoft 365 groups in Azure portals, API or PowerShell' is set to 'No' (Manual)

1.19.title: Ensure that 'Require Multi-Factor Authentication to register or join devices with Azure AD' is set to 'Yes' (Manual)

1.2.title: Ensure that 'Multi-Factor Auth Status' is 'Enabled' for all Non-Privileged Users (Manual)

1.20.title: Ensure That No Custom Subscription Owner Roles Are Created (Automated)

1.21.title: Ensure Security Defaults is enabled on Azure Active Directory (Manual)

1.22.title: Ensure a Custom Role is Assigned Permissions for Administering Resource Locks (Manual)

1.3.title: Ensure guest users are reviewed on a monthly basis (Manual)

1.4.title: Ensure that 'Restore multi-factor authentication on all remembered devices' is Enabled (Manual)

1.5.title: Ensure That 'Number of methods required to reset' is set to '2' (Manual)

1.6.title: Ensure that 'Number of days before users are asked to re- confirm their authentication information' is not set to '0' (Manual)

1.7.title: Ensure that 'Notify users on password resets?' is set to 'Yes' (Manual)

1.8.title: Ensure That 'Notify all admins when other admins reset their password?' is set to 'Yes' (Manual)

1.9.title: Ensure that 'Users can consent to apps accessing company data on their behalf' is set to 'No' (Manual)

2.1.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Servers is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.10.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps (MCAS) Integration with Microsoft Defender for Cloud is Selected (Manual)

2.11.title: Ensure That Auto provisioning of 'Log Analytics agent for Azure VMs' is Set to 'On' (Automated)

2.12.title: Ensure Any of the ASC Default Policy Setting is Not Set to 'Disabled' (Manual)

2.13.title: Ensure 'Additional email addresses' is Configured with a Security Contact Email (Automated)

2.14.title: Ensure That 'Notify about alerts with the following severity' is Set to 'High' (Automated)

2.15.title: Ensure That 'All users with the following roles' is set to 'Owner' (Automated)

2.2.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for App Service is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.3.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Azure SQL Databases is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.4.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for SQL servers on machines is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.5.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Storage is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.6.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Kubernetes is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.7.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Container Registries is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.8.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Key Vault is set to 'On' (Manual)

2.9.title: Ensure that Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (WDATP) integration with Microsoft Defender for Cloud is selected (Manual)

3.1.title: Ensure that 'Secure transfer required' is set to 'Enabled' (Automated)

3.10.title: Ensure Storage logging is Enabled for Blob Service for 'Read', 'Write', and 'Delete' requests (Automated)

3.11.title: Ensure Storage Logging is Enabled for Table Service for 'Read', 'Write', and 'Delete' Requests (Automated)

3.12.title: Ensure the "Minimum TLS version" is set to "Version 1.2" (Automated)

3.2.title: Ensure That Storage Account Access Keys are Periodically Regenerated (Manual)

3.3.title: Ensure Storage Logging is Enabled for Queue Service for 'Read', 'Write', and 'Delete' requests (Automated)

3.4.title: Ensure that Shared Access Signature Tokens Expire Within an Hour (Manual)

3.5.title: Ensure that 'Public access level' is set to Private for blob containers (Automated)

3.6.title: Ensure Default Network Access Rule for Storage Accounts is Set to Deny (Automated)

3.7.title: Ensure 'Trusted Microsoft Services' are Enabled for Storage Account Access (Automated)

3.8.title: Ensure Soft Delete is Enabled for Azure Storage (Automated)

3.9.title: Ensure Storage for Critical Data are Encrypted with Customer Managed Keys (Manual)

4.1.2.title: Ensure that 'Data encryption' is set to 'On' on a SQL Database (Automated)

4.1.3.title: Ensure that 'Auditing' Retention is 'greater than 90 days' (Automated)

4.2.title: SQL Server - Azure Defender for SQL

4.2.1.title: Ensure that Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) on a SQL Server is Set to 'Enabled' (Automated)

4.2.2.title: Ensure that Vulnerability Assessment (VA) is enabled on a SQL server by setting a Storage Account (Automated)

4.2.3.title: Ensure that VA setting 'Periodic recurring scans' to 'on' for each SQL server (Automated)

4.2.4.title: Ensure that VA setting 'Send scan reports to' is configured for a SQL server (Automated)

4.2.5.title: Ensure that Vulnerability Assessment Setting 'Also send email notifications to admins and subscription owners' is Set for Each SQL Server (Automated)

4.3.1.title: Ensure 'Enforce SSL connection' is set to 'ENABLED' for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.2.title: Ensure Server Parameter 'log_checkpoints' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.3.title: Ensure server parameter 'log_connections' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.4.title: Ensure server parameter 'log_disconnections' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.5.title: Ensure server parameter 'connection_throttling' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.6.title: Ensure server parameter 'log_retention_days' is greater than 3 days for PostgreSQL Database Server (Automated)

4.3.7.title: Ensure 'Allow access to Azure services' for PostgreSQL Database Server is disabled (Manual)

4.3.8.title: Ensure 'Infrastructure double encryption' for PostgreSQL Database Server is 'Enabled' (Automated)

4.4.1.title: Ensure 'Enforce SSL connection' is set to 'Enabled' for Standard MySQL Database Server (Automated)

4.4.2.title: Ensure 'TLS Version' is set to 'TLSV1.2' for MySQL flexible Database Server (Automated)

4.5.title: Ensure that Azure Active Directory Admin is configured (Automated)

4.6.title: Ensure SQL server's TDE protector is encrypted with Customer-managed key (Automated)

5.1.2.title: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories (Automated)

5.1.3.title: Ensure the storage container storing the activity logs is not publicly accessible (Automated)

5.1.5.title: Ensure that logging for Azure KeyVault is 'Enabled' (Automated)

6.1.title: Ensure that RDP access is restricted from the internet (Automated)

6.2.title: Ensure that SSH access is restricted from the internet (Automated)

6.3.title: Ensure no SQL Databases allow ingress 0.0.0.0/0 (ANY IP) (Automated)

6.4.title: Ensure that Network Security Group Flow Log retention period is 'greater than 90 days' (Automated)

6.6.title: Ensure that UDP Services are restricted from the Internet (Automated)

7.1.title: Ensure Virtual Machines are utilizing Managed Disks (Manual)

7.2.title: Ensure that 'OS and Data' disks are encrypted with Customer Managed Key (CMK) (Automated)

8.1.title: Ensure that the Expiration Date is set for all Keys in RBAC Key Vaults (Automated)

CIS-GCP-Foundations.name: CIS Google Cloud Platform Foundation Benchmark

1.1.title: Ensure that corporate login credentials are used (Automated)

1.10.title: Ensure KMS encryption keys are rotated within a period of 90 days (Automated)

1.11.title: Ensure that Separation of duties is enforced while assigning KMS related roles to users (Automated)

1.12.title: Ensure API keys are not created for a project (Manual)

1.13.title: Ensure API keys are restricted to use by only specified Hosts and Apps (Manual)

1.14.title: Ensure API keys are restricted to only APIs that application needs access (Manual)

1.15.title: Ensure API keys are rotated every 90 days (Manual)

1.2.title: Ensure that multi-factor authentication is enabled for all non-service accounts (Manual)

1.3.title: Ensure that Security Key Enforcement is enabled for all admin accounts (Manual)

1.4.title: Ensure that there are only GCP-managed service account keys for each service account (Automated)

1.5.title: Ensure that Service Account has no Admin privileges (Automated)

1.6.title: Ensure that IAM users are not assigned the Service Account User or Service Account Token Creator roles at project level (Automated)

1.7.title: Ensure user-managed/external keys for service accounts are rotated every 90 days or less (Automated)

1.8.title: Ensure that Separation of duties is enforced while assigning service account related roles to users (Manual)

1.9.title: Ensure that Cloud KMS cryptokeys are not anonymously or publicly accessible (Automated)
